long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the enchanting world of Frozen every time you open a new tab. This live wallpaper extension transports you to Elsa’s icy kingdom with a stunning animated background of Arendelle’s snow-covered scenery. Perfect for Frozen fans and anyone who loves a wintry atmosphere, this extension combines visual beauty with practical features for a magical browsing experience.

Key Features
🌌 Live Wallpaper: Enjoy an animated glimpse of Princess Elsa's frozen realm.
🔗 Customizable Site Shortcuts: Access your favorite websites with personalized shortcuts.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Instantly search the web from your new tab.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Keep track of time with a stylish clock and date setup.
🔗 Quick Access Links: Easily manage your extension with the "Remove Extension" and "More Extensions" links in the lower left corner.

Dive into Elsa’s magical kingdom and let this extension bring the frozen elegance of Arendelle to your daily browsing. Every new tab opens a window to a snow-laden world, with features that balance practicality and beauty, making it an ideal choice for any Disney enthusiast.
